header.class: elcreative_header fixed top-0 z-50 flex min-h-[75px] w-full flex-col items-center justify-center border-b border-b-[#000] bg-[#ffc017] px-6 md:px-12 lg:px-16

div.class: mx-auto flex w-full max-w-[1192px] items-center justify-between

b:section.class: section_app_bar flex items-center justify-start ltr:mr-2 rtl:ml-2
b:section.name: Header Logo and Title

b:section.class: section_navigation flex items-center justify-end ltr:ml-2 rtl:mr-2
b:section.name: Main Menu

div.class: elcreative_container mx-auto flex w-full max-w-[1192px] flex-col justify-between px-6 pb-6 pt-28 sm:px-12 lg:flex-row md:px-16 md:pt-32 xl:px-0

main.class: w-full max-w-full rtl:mr-0 rtl:ml-0 ltr:md:mr-5 rtl:md:ml-5 lg:max-w-[695px] ltr:lg:mr-10 rtl:lg:ml-10 ltr:xl:mr-16 rtl:xl:ml-16
